sentences.sContent: We may conclude that he never had recourse to this simple experiment.
sentences.sCn: 我们也许可以断定，他根本就没有试过这个简单的实验。

sentences.sContent: Surgery may be the only recourse.
sentences.sCn: 手术可能是唯一的办法。

synos.tran: 求援，求助；[经]追索权；依赖；救生索

trans.tranOther: something that you do to achieve something or deal with a situation, or the act of doing it
